# Model setting

\begin{equation}
\begin{aligned}
CE_i & \sim \text{PLP}(\beta, \theta_i)\\
\theta_i &= \text{EXP}(\gamma_{0i} + \gamma_{1}x_{i1} + \gamma_{2}x_{i2} + \cdots + \gamma_{k}x_{ik})\\
\gamma_{0i}, \gamma_{0i}, \cdots, \gamma_{0D} & \sim \text{i.i.d. }N(\mu_\gamma, \sigma_\gamma^2)\\
\gamma_1 & \sim N(0, 10)\\
\gamma_2 & \sim N(0, 10)\\
&\vdots\\
\gamma_k & \sim N(0, 10)\\
\beta & \sim \text{Gamma}(1, 1)\\
\mu_\gamma &\sim N(0, 10) \\
\sigma_\gamma &\sim \text{Gamma}(1, 1)
\end{aligned}
\end{equation}
